sentences.en: Don't let the wire rub up against the pipe.
sentences.cn: 别让电线碰到管子上.

sentences.en: he rubbed shoulders with TV stars at the party.
sentences.cn: 在聚会上他和电视明星接近。

sentences.en: He used to rub up against many famous movie stars.
sentences.cn: 他过去经常偶然碰到许多有名的影星.

sentences.en: I find it difficult to rub along with Paul , he is so unpredictable.
sentences.cn: 我觉得和保罗很不好相处, 他这个人深不可测.

sentences.en: I hurriedly rubbed myself dry.
sentences.cn: 我赶紧把自己擦干。

sentences.en: I know I behaved foolishly but you needn't rub it in.
sentences.cn: 我知道我的行为很愚蠢,但你不必老提那件事.

sentences.en: I pretended to rub a fleck of grit from one eye.
sentences.cn: 我假装拭去一只眼睛里的沙粒。

sentences.en: Nobody else believed that they had tried to rub out the pope.
sentences.cn: 其他人都不相信他们试图杀死教皇。

sentences.en: Prick the potatoes and rub the skins with salt.
sentences.cn: 将马铃薯戳一些洞，并用盐揉搓外皮。

sentences.en: Rub ointment onto the wasp sting.
sentences.cn: 在黄蜂刺伤处涂些药膏.

sentences.en: Rub the surface of the wood in preparation for the varnish.
sentences.cn: 打磨木头的表面，为刷清漆做准备。

sentences.en: She couldn't rub off the blood stain on her blouse.
sentences.cn: 她没法将上衣的血渍擦掉.

sentences.en: she doesn't have two farthings to rub together.
sentences.cn: 她没有钱。

sentences.en: She sometimes asks if I want a back rub.
sentences.cn: 她有时会问我想不想做个背部按摩。

sentences.en: The child's knocked his head against something. Rub it for him.
sentences.cn: 孩子的头碰疼了, 你给他胡噜胡噜.

sentences.en: There is a difficult time ahead, but we'll rub through somehow.
sentences.cn: 艰难的日子在后头, 可是我们总能勉强对付过去.

sentences.en: they don't just beat you, they rub it in.
sentences.cn: 他们不只是打你，而是揭你的疮疤。

sentences.en: they rub along because their overheads are so low.
sentences.cn: 他们还算能对付过去，因为他们付出的经常管理费用很低。

sentences.en: Trainers rub down an athlete after hard exercise.
sentences.cn: 在运动员剧烈的训练之后,教练们为他按摩.

sentences.en: when parents are having a hard time, their tension can easily &B{rub off on} the kids.
sentences.cn: 当父母日子不好过时，他们的紧张会很容易传染给孩子。

sentences.en: You may need to give the floor a rub-down with glasspaper.
sentences.cn: 你可能得用玻璃砂纸打磨一下地板。

sentences.en: You’ll have to rub harder if you want to get it clean.
sentences.cn: 如果你想把它弄干净，就得更使劲地擦。

words.tran_cn: 橡胶；橡皮；合成橡胶；按摩师
扭转脖子看；好奇地引颈而望

phrases.phrase: not have two — to rub together
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)没有（或几乎没有）某物（尤指钱）
v. 摩擦
(英，非正式)勉强对付过去
按摩时，快速摩擦身体
交际，接触
反复讲（令人不愉快的事）
[美俚]反复讲别人不爱听的事；（故意）触人痛处

phrases.phrase: rub it in (或 rub someone's nose in something)
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)向某人反复提及尴尬的事（或令人痛苦的事）；揭某人的疮疤
（问候时）互相用鼻子摩擦（尤指毛利人和其他一些民族的传统问候方式）
（通过接触或交往而）对…产生影响
感染；沾上；由于摩擦而在…上留下痕迹
勉强度过
双手相擦以示极为满意
&I{【俚语】} 杀掉；干掉
和（某人）接触，和（某人）接近，和（某人）密切往来
与……接触，并肩
惹怒某人，触犯某人，使某人反感
(非正式，主北美)杀掉某人，干掉某人
擦干；擦亮；磨光；擦净
（用橡皮擦）擦掉，抹掉（铅笔字迹）
vt. 擦亮；揉和；激起
接近…

trans.tran_en: A massage can be referred to as a rub
to move your hand, or something such as a cloth, backwards and forwards over a surface while pressing firmly

trans.tran_cn: 摩擦，涂抹，（使）加深痛苦，惹恼
trans.tran_en: to move your hand, or something such as a cloth, backwards and forwards over a surface while pressing firmly
to move your hand, or something such as a cloth, backwards and forwards over a surface while pressing firmly
to move your hand, or something such as a cloth, backwards and forwards over a surface while pressing firmly
